column4: okay so I installed thunar, and instead of keeping nautilus and just using the script that changes thunar to the default file manager, I simply uninstalled nautilus, which was a stupid idea.
not because I need nautilus, but now my file associations are screwed up in firefox when I try to "open folder location" from the downloads window
any idea how I could fix this?
wouldnt reinstalling nautilus and running the script fix it?
